Articles.Content:
It's a Kerbal halloween! Hudby Kerman is finishing up his tour of duty mining Helium 3 on the Mun, when he learns that everything is not as it seems. Apologies to the science fiction movies I flagrantly ripped off.

Advisories for language, sexual situations and comedic kerbal death.
